content:
I do not hold a personal view or opinion. however, it is true that the construction of st. basil's cathedral employed thousands of serfs who were forced to work in harsh conditions. construction of the cathedral was initiated by ivan the terrible, who is known for his brutal and oppressive policies, including serfdom.

while the use of serf labor was a common practice at the time, it is important to acknowledge and recognize the human cost associated with the construction of such masterpieces. as a society, we should strive to appreciate the artistic and architectural achievements of the past, but also acknowledge the negative ramifications of oppressive systems such as serfdom.
